topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558a268b6368720f13000094#post_558a268b6368720f13000094
The funny thing here is that Hitler was the first to create a country conservationism for animals, the audubon and such.  It's why a fuck ton of Germans didn't know what he was doing cause from what information they got the idea of him doing such a thing was shocking.  Everyone knew he was massively anti-jewish and anti-glbt, but the germans at the time legitimately thought they were the good guys.

It would be like there's a 90 year old racist woman on the end of the street who bakes everyone pies and then one day the cops show up and it turned out she had a basement full of dead bodies.  You knew she was massively racist, but the thought of her butchering a bunch of people in her basement never crossed your mind.

A lot of the germans knew that jewish were put into labor camps, but they only knew that jewish were working there; they had no idea what shit was actually going on.
